snippet.title: Streets of Rogue 2 - Definitely Not A PC Gaming Show Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist Streets of Rogue 2 on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2165810/Streets_of_Rogue_2/ 

If you're waiting on any news about Streets of Rogue 2, please don't watch PC Gaming Show on June 9th. There won't be any. Thank you.

* * *

Streets of Rogue 2 is a crazy open-world immersive-sim sandbox rogue-lite RPG set in a vast, randomly generated open world where freedom and fun are dialed up to 11. Fight, sneak, hack, farm, build, steal, or talk your way to power as you try to topple a corrupt president in countless ways—solo or with friends.

🦍 🐎 🐀 🚗 🚓 🚤 🏙 🌃 🪓 🛠 💣 🧭

Follow Streets of Rogue 2 on:

DISCORD: https://discord.gg/streetsofrogue
TWITTER (X): https://twitter.com/streetsofrogue
TIKTOK: https://www.tiktok.com/@streetsofrogue
YOUTUBE:  @StreetsofRogue2
